LanguageData.EggRoeFertilized.label: roe (fert.)
LanguageData.EggRoeFertilized.description: Fertilized eggs from a sea animal. If all goes Plant_Grass, it should hatch.
LanguageData.EggRoeUnfertilized.label: roe (unfert.)
LanguageData.EggRoeUnfertilized.description: Unfertilized eggs from a sea animal.
LanguageData.EggSnailFertilized.label: snail egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggSnailFertilized.description: Fertilized snail egg. If all goes Plant_Grass, it should hatch into a giant snail. A delicacy.
LanguageData.EggSnailUnfertilized.label: snail egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.RedWoodLog.label: redwood
LanguageData.RedWoodLog.description: Wood from redwood and sequoia trees or other fibrous plants. Red, valuable and more fireproof than regular wood. Useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. A raw stick of wood can be used as a weapon in a pinch.
LanguageData.RedWoodLog.tools.log.label: log
LanguageData.TKKN_Amber.label: Amber
LanguageData.TKKN_Amber.description: Ancient tree sap that has been preserved. Sometimes it has small creatures inside it. A soft resin that polishes up beautifully.
LanguageData.TKKN_BlockLava.label: basalt blocks
LanguageData.TKKN_Cattails.label: cattails
LanguageData.TKKN_ChunkLava.label: basalt chunk
LanguageData.TKKN_ChunkLava.description: A chunk of rock. Can be cut into usable stone blocks.
LanguageData.TKKN_LavaRock.label: basalt
LanguageData.TKKN_LavaRock.description: Lava that has cooled into a black rock with flecks of lava glass.
LanguageData.TKKN_MinableAmber.label: amber
LanguageData.TKKN_MinableAmber.description: Rock containing bits of preserved sap.
LanguageData.TKKN_MinablePetrifiedWood.label: petrified wood
LanguageData.TKKN_MinablePetrifiedWood.description: Rock containing bits of petrified wood.
LanguageData.TKKN_PetrifiedWood.label: petrified wood
LanguageData.TKKN_PetrifiedWood.description: Ancient wood that has been preserved. Feels like rock. Very rare.
LanguageData.TKKN_PricklyPear.label: prickly pear
LanguageData.TKKN_ShellfishMeat.label: shellfish meat
LanguageData.TKKN_SmoothedLavaRock.label: smoothed basalt
LanguageData.TKKN_SmoothedLavaRock.description: Lava that has cooled into a black rock with flecks of lava glass. The flaky rock has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.
LanguageData.TKKN_WildGreens.label: wild greens
LanguageData.TKKN_WildGreens.description: Bitter, leavy greens and flowers harvested from wild plants.
